document.full_text: two german government advisers see a debt restructuring by greece as inevitable while two of the overborrowed country's ministers continued to rule it out in newspaper interviews on saturday.
document.title: german government experts see greece restructuring debt
lines_and_colors: two german government advisers see a debt restructuring by greece as inevitable while two of the overborrowed country's ministers continued to rule it out in newspaper interviews on saturday.
